name: Cycling Endurance
description: Building aerobic endurance and lower body strength through cycling-based workouts.

cards.title: Long Ride Endurance Training
cards.description: Cycling at a moderate pace for extended periods to improve aerobic efficiency.
bulletpoints: Maintain a consistent cadence for efficient pedaling
Use a heart rate monitor to stay in the endurance training zone
Increase distance progressively to enhance stamina
cards.summaryText: Plan steady-state rides with cadence discipline, heart-rate targets, and gradual mileage bumps to grow aerobic base.

cards.title: Interval Cycling for Power & Speed
cards.description: Alternating high-intensity sprints with recovery periods to improve overall cycling performance.
bulletpoints: Sprint for 30 seconds, then recover at an easy pace for 1-2 minutes
Increase resistance or pedal speed for greater intensity
Focus on controlled breathing to sustain effort levels
cards.summaryText: Alternate explosive sprints with measured recoveries, tweaking resistance and breath control to push power gains.
